Wednesday's at Tidal: Open Mic Night
Wednesday, September 3, 2025
8:00 PM
9:30 PM
20:00
21:30
Tidal Brewing Co.
14311 Spring Hill Drive
Spring Hill, FL, 34609
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Please join your host and Tidal’s awesome bartender, Ryan Cleveland, for an open mic night! Every other week we will be welcoming amateur comics from the area to showcase their talents.
Registration begins at 7:30 pm the night of with the show kicking off at 8 pm. Sets will be limited to 5 minutes.
Because of the nature of this show, it is encouraged that children under the age of 18 are left at home or parents can also take advantage of our outside seating area during the show.

Thursdays at Tidal: Trivia
Thursday, August 28, 2025
7:00 PM
8:30 PM
19:00
20:30
Tidal Brewing Co.
14311 Spring Hill Drive
Spring Hill, FL, 34609
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Looking for a way to kick back, relax, and have some fun this summer? Gather your friends, family, and fellow trivia enthusiasts for some summer break themed trivia nights the entire month of August!
Tonight’s theme is “Disney vacation” featuring questions about princesses, villains, animal friends, Disney history, Disney parks, and Marvel universe.
There will be a word of the day each week posted in the event page as well as on our story for bonus points as well as the occasional extra credit for all you slackers.
Trivia begins promptly at 7 pm. Team size must be no larger than 6 people.
Put your team to the test and win free beer if you're the best !

Please join us every other Thursday for Waves of Knowledge Trivia hosted by 2 of your fav former HCSD educators!
Each time we meet we will have general knowledge questions covering school subjects: Science, History, Literature, Vocabulary, Geography and of course electives. This week's elective will be Home Economics.
There will be a word of the day each week posted in the event page as well as on our story for bonus points as well as the occasional extra credit for all you slackers.
Trivia begins promptly at 7 pm. Team size must be no larger than 6 people.
Put your team to the test and win free beer if you're the best !

ICS
We're back with another Oktidalfest celebration! Join us for this festive Grove Market featuring 20+ vendors, beer releases, merch, live music, food trucks, and more!
Grove Market is a community-driven event showcasing local artists, makers, and small businesses coordinated by Roots Creative Co.
Applications for this event are coming soon! Keep an eye out on the
Roots Creative Company Page
Please note: We will never reach out to you over Facebook for payment. All vendor communication will happen through email. Please be careful and do not send payment to scammers posing as hosts. Grove Market is run by Allisa Babor of Roots Creative Co. Email allisa@rootscreativeco.com for questions.

8th Annual Oktidalfest
Saturday, September 20, 2025
12:00 PM
12:00
Sunday, September 21, 2025
7:00 PM
19:00
Tidal Brewing Co.
14311 Spring Hill Drive
Spring Hill, FL, 34609
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Please join us in paying tribute to German tradition by celebrating our 8th annual Oktidalfest with us!
- - The Events - -
Saturday, September 20
*Open early (11 am) for Tide Pool Members
*Kielbasa Bus onsite all day from 12-11 pm with their regular menu and a few German inspired specials
*The Roost onsite serving grilled pretzels from 5-8 pm
*Live music by Michael Nichols from 1-4 pm
*Stein hoisting competition
*Live music by Rene Schlegel from 7-10 pm
Sunday, September 21
*Grove Market 12-5 pm
*Live music by Taylor Reed from 1-4 pm
*Spice Corner onsite from 12-5 pm
*Stein hoisting competition
Both days
*German beer releases (Specific beer releases to follow)
*Special pour deal for ANY Oktidalfest stein - we will have steins onsite to fill if you don't have one of your own
So, dust off your dirndls and lederhosen and get ready to drink with us. Prost friends!

Join us October 14th from 7pm-8pm for our Tidal Bookclub.
We are hosting a Literary Costume contest so come dressed to impress!
Prizes will be given for Peoples Choice award and Max and Andi will choose their favorite!
The October book is House of Salt and Sorrows by Erin A. Craig
Please join us to discuss the book, vote on December's book and pick up Novembers pre-orders.
You can pre-order the book being discussed here:

Unleash your creativity at our Coastal Lazy Susan Workshop! In this
hands-on class
, you’ll create a beautiful 9-inch lazy Susan using your favorite resin colors—and we’ll even teach you how to make lifelike ocean waves.
Customize your coastal scene with beachy extras like shells, crushed glass, rocks, and even tiny resin sea creatures. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned crafter, this class is perfect for ages 12 and up!
What’s included:
• 9-inch wooden lazy Susan
• Resin and pigments
• Shells, glass, rocks, and decorative extras
• All tools and materials provided
*Box for transport will be provided so you can take your project home with you that night!
Feel free to bring your own food/snacks to enjoy while you create or food truck on site - the amazing staff will be available for all beverage purchases including NA option!
No refunds once ticket has been purchased. If you cannot attend for any reason, the Lazy Susan will be made for you.

hands-on class
, you’ll create a beautiful 9-inch lazy Susan using your favorite resin colors—and we’ll even teach you how to make lifelike ocean waves.
Customize your coastal scene with beachy extras like shells, crushed glass, rocks, and even tiny resin sea creatures. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned crafter, this class is perfect for ages 12 and up!
What’s included:
• 9-inch wooden lazy Susan
• Resin and pigments
• Shells, glass, rocks, and decorative extras
• All tools and materials provided
*Box for transport will be provided so you can take your project home with you that night!

Looking to make new connections, build relationships, or just unwind with your neighbors after work? The Easy Pour Social is a casual, no-pressure monthly meetup for professionals, small business owners, and community-minded folks.
There’s no agenda, no sales pitch, and no RSVP needed. Just show up, grab a drink, and come and hang out with us at the taproom.
Open to all
Drinks available for purchase
Hosted at Tidal Brewing Co. in partnership with Find Your Paradise (McLeod Real Estate) & Roots Creative Co.
Every third Tuesday of the month
Come as you are, stay as long as you’d like. Let’s build community one easy pour at a time.

Please join your host and Tidal’s awesome bartender, Ryan Cleveland, in the taproom for a special  Sunday open mic comedy show! One Sunday a month we will be welcoming amateur comics from the area to showcase their talents.
Registration begins at 4:30 pm the day of with the show kicking off at 5 pm. Sets will be limited to 5 minutes.
Because of the nature of this show, it is encouraged that children under the age of 18 are left at home or parents can also take advantage of our outside seating area during the show.
Midway by the Sea food truck onsite for dinner until 6 pm!

ICS
Join us Sunday August 24th at Tidal Brewing Co. for a
Porch Pumpkin Paint & Sip
Instruction begins at 1pm - ANY age can paint with us. No artistic ability required.
Each guest will receive a raw wood pumpkin to paint, distress & personalize at the event. Choose from two size options OR bundle to create a beautiful porch set up with both sizes.
Size Options:
7x10x4
9x15x4
Or BOTH!
Enjoy delicious craft beverages including NA options during the event. Feel free to bring your own snacks or order from the food truck on site
No refunds once ticket has been purchased. If you cannot attend the event for any reason you may choose to pick up your project materials at your convenience within 30 days of event date.

Coastal Lazy Susan DIY with Craft Social Florida
Sunday, September 14, 2025
1:00 PM
3:00 PM
13:00
15:00
Tidal Brewing Co.
14311 Spring Hill Drive
Spring Hill, FL, 34609
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Unleash your creativity at our Coastal Lazy Susan Workshop! In this
hands-on class
, you’ll create a beautiful 9-inch lazy Susan using your favorite resin colors—and we’ll even teach you how to make lifelike ocean waves.
Customize your coastal scene with beachy extras like shells, crushed glass, rocks, and even tiny resin sea creatures. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned crafter, this class is perfect for ages 12 and up!
What’s included:
• 9-inch wooden lazy Susan
• Resin and pigments
• Shells, glass, rocks, and decorative extras
• All tools and materials provided
*Box for transport will be provided so you can take your project home with you that night!
Feel free to bring your own food/snacks to enjoy while you create or food truck on site - the amazing staff will be available for all beverage purchases including NA option!
No refunds once ticket has been purchased. If you cannot attend for any reason, the Lazy Susan will be made for you.
